__note__: This is file is autogenerated, do not edit it manually. For more info https://data.aoe4world.com/

data.name: Adjustable Crossbars
data.description: Increases Mangonel range by +1, blast radius by +75%, and adds +1 projectile to attacks.
data.descriptionCN: 投石车射程 +1，爆炸范围 +75%，且攻击抛射物 +1。

data.name: Angled Surfaces
data.description: Increase the ranged armor of all non-siege units by +1.
data.descriptionCN: 所有非攻城单位的远程护甲 +1。

data.name: Armored Hull
data.description: Increase the health of all military ships by +20% and ranged armor by +1.
data.descriptionCN: 所有军事船只的生命值 +20%，远程护甲 +1。

data.name: Arrowslits
data.description: Add defensive arrowslits to this structure and increase garrison arrow range by +1. Only one weapon emplacement can be added.
data.descriptionCN: 为此建筑添加防御型射箭槽并使驻扎单位的弓箭攻击范围 +1。只能添加一座武器炮台。

data.name: Balanced Projectiles
data.description: Increase the ranged damage of all arrows and bolts by +1.
data.descriptionCN: 所有弓箭和弩箭的远程伤害 +1。

data.name: Biology
data.description: Investing in natural sciences increases the health of all cavalry by +25%.
data.descriptionCN: 投资自然科学可使所有骑兵的生命值 +25%。

data.name: Bloomery
data.description: Increase the melee damage of all non-siege units by +1.
data.descriptionCN: 所有非攻城单位的近战伤害 +1。

data.name: Boiling Oil
data.description: Towers and Keeps gain a boiling oil attack against nearby units that deals 30 damage.
data.descriptionCN: 箭塔和城堡能对附近敌方单位倾倒沸油，对其造成 30 伤害。

data.name:
Advancement
(Bonus Culture Wing)
data.description:
Constructs the Culture Wing.
Build this wing to advance to the next Age in 20% less time and with 1300 less costs.
data.descriptionCN:
建造文化偏殿。
建造该偏殿后，升级至下一个时代的时间缩短 20%，且花费的资源减少 1300。

data.name:
Logistics
(Bonus Culture Wing)
data.description:
Constructs the Culture Wing.
Upon completion, grants 4 Dervish, improves the unit's healing by +50%, and turns it on permanently.
data.descriptionCN:
建造文化偏殿。
完成后，可获得 4 名德尔维希，该单位的治疗效果 +50%，并永久启用。

data.name:
Growth
(Bonus Economic Wing)
data.description:
Constructs the Economic Wing.
Upon completion, grants 10 Villagers and all Villagers work +10% faster.
data.descriptionCN:
建造经济偏殿。
完成后获得 10 个村民，且所有村民工作速度提高 +10%。

data.name:
Industry
(Bonus Economic Wing)
data.description:
Constructs the Economic Wing.
Upon completion, awards 2800 Wood and 900 Stone. Villagers build +50% faster.
data.descriptionCN:
建造经济偏殿。
完成后，获得 2800 木材和 900 石料。村民建造速度 +50%。

data.name:
Master Smiths
(Bonus Military Wing)
data.description:
Constructs the Military Wing.
Military Academy and the Blacksmith's damage and armor technologies become free and complete automatically when entering an Age. (Those of other Ages must still be researched as normal).
data.descriptionCN:
建造军事偏殿。
进入一个时代后，军事学院和铁匠铺的伤害和护甲科技将变为免费且会自动完成 (其他时代则必须照常进行研究)。

data.name:
Reinforcement
(Bonus Military Wing)
data.description:
Constructs the Military Wing.
Upon completion, Cavalry units gain the ability to construct siege weapons.
The House of Wisdom produces 7 Desert Raiders immediately and then every 2 minutes for the rest of the game.
data.descriptionCN:
建造军事偏殿。
完成后，骑兵单位获得建造攻城武器的能力。
智慧宫立即生产 7 名沙漠掠夺者，并在本局游戏剩余时间内每 2 分钟生产该数量的沙漠掠夺者。

data.name:
Advisors
(Bonus Trade Wing)
data.description:
Constructs the Trade Wing.
Upon completion, gain 7 Atabeg which can be garrisoned in any military production building (except Docks) to increase the health of newly trained units by 20%.
data.descriptionCN:
建造贸易偏殿。
完成后获得 7 个阿塔贝格，可驻扎于任意军事生产建筑 (除了码头) 中，使新训练单位的生命值增加 20%。

data.name:
Bazaar
(Bonus Trade Wing)
data.description:
Constructs the Trade Wing.
Every three minutes a trade caravan arrives with a random selection of four favorable exchanges of resources and units.
The quality of these trades is permanently set depending on the Age at which the Trade Wing is constructed. Using the Trade Wing to enter a later age provides more lucrative trades.
data.descriptionCN:
建造贸易偏殿。
每三分钟会有一个贸易商队携带随机的四种实用资源和单位抵达。
这些贸易的质量取决于建造贸易偏殿所在的时代。使用贸易偏殿进入更晚的时代可以提供更赚钱的贸易。

data.name: Cannon Emplacement
data.description: Add a defensive cannon emplacement to this structure.
data.descriptionCN: 为此建筑添加一座防御型加农炮炮台。

data.name:
Advancement
(Castle Culture Wing)
data.description:
Constructs the Culture Wing.

建造该偏殿后，升级至下一个时代的时间缩短 20%，且花费的资源减少 400。

(Castle Economic Wing)
data.description:
Constructs the Economic Wing.
Upon completion, grants 7 Villagers. Orchards gain 100 additional food.
data.descriptionCN:
建造经济偏殿。
完成后获得 7 个村民。果园可额外获得 100 食物。

data.name: Chemistry
data.description: Advancements in alchemical research increase the bonus damage of all gunpowder siege weapons by +25%.
data.descriptionCN: 炼金术研究的进步使所有火药攻城武器的伤害加成 +25%。

data.name: Court Architects
data.description: Patronage of the finest builders increases all building health by +30%.
data.descriptionCN: 资助最优秀的建筑工可使所有建筑的生命值 +30%。

data.name: Crosscut Saw
data.description: Increase Villagers' gathering rate for Wood by 15% and Wood gatherers carry capacity by +5.
data.descriptionCN: 村民的木材采集速率 +15%，木材采集者运载量 +5。

data.name: Cupellation
data.description: Gold gatherers drop off 15% more resources.
data.descriptionCN: 黄金采集者存放资源量额外 +15%。

data.name: Damascus Steel
data.description: Increase the melee damage of all non-siege units by +1.
data.descriptionCN: 所有非攻城单位的近战伤害 +1。

data.name: Decarbonization
data.description: Increase the melee damage of all non-siege units by +1.
data.descriptionCN: 所有非攻城单位的近战伤害 +1。

data.name: Double Broadax
data.description: Increase Villagers' gathering rate for Wood by 15%.
data.descriptionCN: 村民的木材采集速率 +15%。

data.name: Drift Nets
data.description: Increase the gathering rate of Fishing Ships by +10%, carry capacity by +20 and move speed by +10%.
data.descriptionCN: 渔船的采集速率 +10%，运载量 +20，移动速度 +10%。

data.name: Elite Army Tactics
data.description: Training elite infantry leads to improved prowess in battle. Melee Infantry gain +15% damage and +15% health.
data.descriptionCN: 训练精锐步兵可提高战斗力。近战步兵获得伤害 +15% 和生命值 +15%。

data.name: Explosives
data.description: Increase the damage of Incendiary Ships by +40%.
data.descriptionCN: 燃烧船伤害 +40%。

data.name: Extended Lines
data.description: Increase the gathering rate of Fishing Ships by +15% and carry capacity by +10.
data.descriptionCN: 渔船的采集速率 +15%，运载量 +10。

data.name: Extra Hammocks
data.description: Increases the number of arrows fired by Archer Ships by +1.
data.descriptionCN: 步弓手船只射出的箭矢数量 +1。

data.name: Fertilization
data.description: Increase Villagers' gathering rate for Food by 10%. Does not apply to hunted meat.
data.descriptionCN: 村民的食物采集速率 +10%，不包括狩猎肉类。

data.name: Fitted Leatherwork
data.description: Increase the melee armor of all non-siege units by +1.
data.descriptionCN: 所有非攻城单位的近战护甲 +1。

data.name: Forestry
data.description: Double the rate at which Villagers chop down trees.
data.descriptionCN: 村民伐木速率加倍。

data.name: Fortify Outpost
data.description: Add +1000 health and +5 fire armor to this Outpost.
data.descriptionCN: 此哨站的生命值 +1000，火焰护甲 +5。

data.name: Geometry
data.description: Increase damage of Trebuchets by +20%.
data.descriptionCN: 巨型投石机的伤害 +20%。

data.name: Greased Axles
data.description: Increase the movement speed of siege engines by +15%.
data.descriptionCN: 攻城器械的移动速度 +15%。

data.name: Heated Shot
data.description: Archer Ship arrows light enemy Ships on fire, dealing damage over time.
data.descriptionCN: 步弓手船箭点燃敌方战舰，造成持续伤害。

data.name: Herbal Medicine
data.description: Increase the healing rate of religious units and healers by +60%.
data.descriptionCN: 宗教单位和治疗者的治疗速率 +60%。

data.name: Horticulture
data.description: Increase Villagers' gathering rate for Food by 10%. Does not apply to hunted meat.

data.name: Incendiaries
data.description: Incendiary Ships gain +20% explosion range.
data.descriptionCN: 燃烧船的爆炸范围 +20%。

data.name: Incendiary Arrows
data.description: Flammable munitions grant non-gunpowder ranged units a siege arrow or bolt when attacking buildings and increase their damage by +20%.
data.descriptionCN: 易燃弹药可为非火药远程单位在攻击建筑物时提供攻城箭矢或弩箭，并使其伤害 +20%。

data.name: Infantry Support
data.description: Infantry increase the armor of nearby camels by 3.
data.descriptionCN: 步兵会使附近骆驼的护甲增加 3。

data.name: Insulated Helm
data.description: Increase the melee armor of all non-siege units by +1.
data.descriptionCN: 所有非攻城单位的近战护甲 +1。

data.name: Iron Undermesh
data.description: Increase the ranged armor of all non-siege units by +1.
data.descriptionCN: 所有非攻城单位的远程护甲 +1。

data.name: Lightweight Beams
data.description: Increase Battering Ram attack speed by +20% and reduce their field construction time by -50%.
data.descriptionCN: 攻城锤攻击速度 +20%，战场工程时间 -50%。

data.name: Lumber Preservation
data.description: Increase Villagers' gathering rate for Wood by 15%.
data.descriptionCN: 村民的木材采集速率 +15%。

data.name: Master Smiths
data.description: Increase the melee armor of all non-siege units by +1.
data.descriptionCN: 所有非攻城单位的近战护甲 +1。

data.name: Military Academy
data.description:
Increase the production speed of infantry, cavalry, siege, and transport units at buildings by 33%.
Does not affect religious units or other support units.
data.descriptionCN:
建筑中的步兵、骑兵、攻城以及运输工具单位的生产速度 +33%。
该效果不适用于宗教单位或其他辅助单位。

data.name: Naval Arrowslits
data.description: Add a defensive arrowslit to this Dock which only attacks ships.
data.descriptionCN: 在这个码头上添加一个防御型射箭槽，只会对船只作出攻击。

data.name: Phalanx
data.description: Increase the attack range of Spearmen by +100%.
data.descriptionCN: 长矛兵的攻击范围 +100%。

data.name: Piety
data.description: Increase the health of religious units and healers by +40.
data.descriptionCN: 宗教单位和治疗者的生命值 +40。

data.name: Platecutter Point
data.description: Increase the ranged damage of all arrows and bolts by +1.
data.descriptionCN: 所有弓箭和弩箭的远程伤害 +1。

data.name: Precision Cross-Breeding
data.description: Increase Villagers' gathering rate for Food by 10%. Does not apply to hunted meat.
data.descriptionCN: 村民的食物采集速率 +10%，不包括狩猎肉类。

data.name: Professional Scouts
data.description:
Scouts gain the ability to carry animal carcasses and +100% damage against wild animals.
Scouts move -55% slower while carrying and cannot pick up Boar. Deer slowly decay while being carried.
data.descriptionCN:
侦察兵获得携带动物尸骸的能力，且对野生动物造成的伤害 +100%。
侦察兵在携带动物尸骸时移动速度 -55%，且无法拾取野猪尸骸。若携带的是鹿尸骸，则会缓慢腐烂。

data.name: Roller Shutter Triggers
data.description: Increases Springald attack speed by +25% and grants +10% Ranged Resistance.
data.descriptionCN: 扭力弩炮攻击速度 +25%，并且获得 +10% 远程抗性。

data.name: Serpentine Powder
data.description: With new gunpowder, Handcannoneers gain +5 damage against melee infantry and gain a brief increase to their movement speed after firing their weapon.
data.descriptionCN: 使用新型火药，火枪兵对近战步兵的伤害 +5，并在武器开火后短暂提高移动速度。

data.name: Shaft Mining
data.description: Increase Villagers' gathering rate for Gold and Stone by 15%.
data.descriptionCN: 村民的黄金和石料采集速率 +15%。

data.name: Shipwrights
data.description: Increase the health of all military ships by +20% and ranged armor by +1.
data.descriptionCN: 所有军事船只的生命值 +20%，远程护甲 +1。

data.name: Siege Carpentry
data.description:
Upon completion, siege units gain access to the Structural Reinforcements ability.
Siege units gain +20 melee armor and +5 fire armor for 10 seconds.
data.descriptionCN:
完成后，攻城单位可获得结构强化能力。
攻城单位近战护甲 +20，火焰护甲 +5，持续 10 秒。

data.name: Siege Works
data.description: New carpentry techniques increase the health of siege units by +20%.
data.descriptionCN: 新的木工技术可使攻城部队的生命值 +20%。

data.name: Silk Bowstrings
data.description: Stringing bows with silk grants Archers +1.5 range and Mounted Archers +0.75 range.
data.descriptionCN: 用丝线制作弓弦可以使弓兵的射程 +1.5，使骑射手的射程 +0.75。

data.name: Specialized Pick
data.description: Increase Villagers' gathering rate for Gold and Stone by 15%.
data.descriptionCN: 村民的黄金和石料采集速率 +15%。

data.name: Springald Crews
data.description: Springald Ships gain +1 range and attack 20% faster.
data.descriptionCN: 扭力弩炮船的攻击范围 +1 ，攻击速度 +20%。

data.name: Springald Emplacement
data.description: Add a defensive springald emplacement to this structure.
data.descriptionCN: 为此建筑添加一座防御型扭力弩炮炮台。

data.name: Spyglass
data.description: Increase the sight radius of Scouts by 30%.
data.descriptionCN: 侦察兵的视线半径增加 30%。

data.name: Steeled Arrow
data.description: Increase the ranged damage of all arrows and bolts by +1.
data.descriptionCN: 所有弓箭和弩箭的远程伤害 +1。

data.name: Sultan's Mamluks
data.description: Infantry gains +25% damage and +20% movement speed for 30 seconds after defeating a unit.
data.descriptionCN: 击败一个单位后，步兵伤害 +25%，移动速度 +20%，持续 30 秒。

data.name: Survival Techniques
data.description: Increase Villagers' hunted meat gather rate by +15%.
data.descriptionCN: 村民狩猎肉类采集速率 +15%。

data.name: Swivel Cannon
data.description: Springald Ships gain an additional Cannon which fires in 360 degrees.
data.descriptionCN: 扭力弩炮船获得了一门额外的加农炮，可以 360 度射击。

data.name: Teak Masts
data.description: Increase the health of military ships by +10%.
data.descriptionCN: 军事船只的生命值增加 +10%。

data.name: Textiles
data.description: Increase Villagers' health by +50%.
data.descriptionCN: 村民生命值 +50%。

data.name: Tithe Barns
data.description: Relics placed in a Mosque provide an income of +40 Food, +40 Wood, and +10 Stone every minute.
data.descriptionCN: 放置在清真寺的圣物每分钟都会提供 40 食物、40 木材和 10 石料收入。

data.name: Wedge Rivets
data.description: Increase the ranged armor of all non-siege units by +1.
data.descriptionCN: 所有非攻城单位的远程护甲 +1。

data.name: Wheelbarrow
data.description: Increase the carry capacity of Villagers by +5 and their movement speed by +15%.
data.descriptionCN: 村民的运载量 +5，移动速度 +15%。
